descr.p: "Truly" is the title of the debut solo single by R&B singer-songwriter Lionel Richie in 1982 (see 1982 in music). Richie wrote the song and co-produced it with James Anthony Carmichael.

Released as the first single from his self-titled debut album in 1982, "Truly" went to #1 on the Hot 100 chart for two weeks near the end of 1982. It also spent four weeks at #1 on the adult contemporary chart and logged nine weeks at #2 on the R&B chart. In addition, "Truly" made the Top 10 in England, where the song peaked at #6. The song won a Grammy Award for Richie in the category Best Male Pop Vocal Performance.
British singer and actor Steven Houghton released a cover version of the same single in March 1998 which reached #23 on the UK pop chart.
